name: Caves & Cargo
overview: If you remember the 1989 Amiga, Atari ST and DOS game of Gravity Force, then you might like this early hour news story, as we’ve recently been informed by a good friend of ours on Facebook, that TheoTheoderich is not only working on an Amiga game inspired by Gravity Force called Caves & Cargo, but he has also released the first version of the game for you to try as the creators first self-made (and almost finished) BlitzBasic2 game!)”.
